```{r}
library(hexSticker)
library(magick)
library(sysfonts)
library(tidyverse)

aard_img <- image_read("man/figures/taard.png")
sticker(
  subplot = aard_img,
  package = "readUCI",
  s_width = 1.75,
  s_height = 1.75, 
  s_x = 1,
  s_y = 0.75,
  p_size = 18,
  p_color = 'goldenrod2',
  p_y = 1.35,
  h_fill = "#b0cee4",
  h_color = "dodgerblue4",
  h_size = 2) %>%
  print()

save_sticker("man/figures/readUCI.png")

```
